entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 a.m. CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
